entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.7°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 08:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
